I’ve been somewhat busy with work of late. I’m involved with the Tales of Things project which goes live this Friday. It’s been a hectic time but I’ve been involved with lots of different aspects which have been quite good fun.

We’ve been playing a lot with Django and Nginx with our shiny new server at CASA, UCL. So far, Django has been pretty good to work with though it’s not without its faults here and there. Generally, we are pretty hopeful things will work out well.

Using QRCodes and RFIDTags to give objects a voice is a difficult but fun problem and there certainly have been quite a few crazy ideas thrown about the office. So be sure to stop by Tales of Things when you get chance.

One of these off the wall ideas is the use of Audio to convey memories with your iPhone:
